DOC.brief_summary: Introduction Research Problem : The aim project evaluate compare two full coronal restoration primary posterior molar period 3 , 6 12 month term restoration failure , marginal integrity , proximal contact , secondary caries , occlusion gingival response . The restoration type Stainless Steel Crowns ( SSC ) NuSmile Zirconia Crowns ( Nu/ZR ) . Materials Methods : Children attend King Abdulaziz University , Faculty Dentistry ( KAUFD ) clinic need restoration screen inclusion criterion till 120 teeth recruit ( 60 teeth SSC restoration 60 Nu/ZR restoration ) . Split mouth technique use ensure equalize variable group , patient side restore SSC opposite side restore Nu/ZR crown . Randomization do use Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS ) software version 20.0 ( Armonk , New York ; International Business Machines Corporation ( IBM Corp ) age group separately uniform random variable generation . A simple descriptive statistic use analysis T-Tests Wilcoxon Signed-Rank use . Level significance set ( Î± = 0.05 ) level confidence ( 95 % ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Between Zirconia Stainless Steel Crowns
DOC.criteria: Age group 48 year Free systemic disease Cooperative patient At least two matched bilateral carious primary molar Minimal two surface caries target tooth Written consent obtain parent/guardian Any subject fall inclusion criterion exclude .
